summary: Build an editable, badminton-themed dashboard to track a centerâ€™s monthly revenue, targets, coach salaries, and salary output percentage, now including a chart visualization and using only a Center name (no Center location), with Center also captured for coaches information.
architectural_notes: Center should be represented as a name-only field (no location) and used consistently in monthly records and coach salary entries.

existing_features.title: Create a dashboard UI that shows a monthly view of: revenue, target, total coaches salary, and salary output percentage (total salary / revenue * 100) for a selected month.
Provide an easy data-editing experience for monthly records, including adding a new month, editing revenue/target values, and editing coaches (add/remove coach rows and edit salary values).
Wire the frontend to the backend using React Query for loading and mutations, including optimistic or immediate UI updates with proper loading/error states.
Apply a cohesive badminton-themed visual design across the dashboard (court-inspired color palette, shuttlecock/racket motifs, and sporty typography) while keeping the layout clean and readable.
Add static badminton-themed imagery (logo/mark and subtle background pattern) and render them in the UI as part of the dashboard branding.
Add a Center input to the monthly record editing UI and wire it through to save/load so it is shown in the dashboard view and editable in the editor.

Add a bar chart to the dashboard that matches the uploaded example: a grouped bar chart comparing Revenue Done vs Target per Center for the currently selected month (X-axis: Center name; Y-axis: amount; legend with two series). The chart must be driven from persisted monthly records (i.e., all records that match the selected month/year) so multiple centers can be compared within the same month.

Remove Center location everywhere and keep only Center name across the UI and data flow: eliminate the Center Location input, its validation, and the Center info display of location; ensure save/load only uses center name.
Add a Center field to each coach row in the Coaches editor (coaches information) and persist coach rows in the backend so coach-level Center values are saved and restored for a month/year record.

Add a selectable options UI for the "Center Name" field in the Monthly Record editor so users can pick from existing center names already saved in dashboards, while still allowing manual entry of a new center name.

Add a selectable options UI for the "Center" field in each coach row in the Coaches table editor so users can pick from existing center names already saved in dashboards, while still allowing manual entry of a new center name.
Ensure the selectable options lists for Center Name and Coach Center automatically reflect newly saved or deleted records after React Query refreshes dashboard data.

Add a 'Center' column in both relevant dashboard views/tables (e.g., monthly records and editing UI)
Extend the backend MonthlyDashboard record to include a Center field and persist it alongside month/year/revenue/target/coachSalaries.
Add a chart visualization to the dashboard (for the monthly financial metrics).
Remove Center location and keep only Center name across the UI/data model.
Include a Center field in coaches information (associate coaches/salary rows with a center).
